spirit:component.spirit:description: The Xilinx 7 Series Integrated Block for PCI Express (1-lane, 2-lane, 4-lane, and 8-lane) uses the 7-Series Integrated Hard IP Block for PCI Express in conjunction with flexible 7-Series architectural features to implement a PCI Express Base Specification v2.1 compliant PCI Express Endpoint or Root Port. Unique features of the LogiCORE Block for PCI Express are the high performance AXI Interface, optimal buffering for high bandwidth applications, and BAR checking and filtering.

xilinx:coreExtensions.xilinx:displayName: 7 Series Integrated Block for PCI Express
